title: Does my phone support 3D acceleration?
answer:
To enable this function, touch Settings > Developer options and select Force GPU rendering. 

 When 3D acceleration is enabled, game graphics are more fluent but more memory is used. If you run many other applications while playing games, the phone may run slowly. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110933) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110934)
